translation.en: Ready or not, here I come.
You'll stay with Aunt May and Uncle Ben for a little while.
translation.es: Te vas a quedar con la tía May... ...y el tío Ben un tiempo.

translation.en: Doesn't like crust on his sandwiches...
translation.es: Le gustan los sándwiches sin corteza...

translation.en: ...and he likes to sleep with a little light on.
Listen, are you busy Friday night?
translation.es: ¿Tienes planes parael viernes en la noche?

translation.en: Cool. Can you take pictures of my boyfriend's car?
translation.es: Perfecto. ¿Le puedes tomarfotos al auto de mi novio?

translation.en: You know, I really wanna frame a good one for his birthday.
translation.es: Quiero regalarle una foto linda... ...para su cumpleaños.

translation.en: That's really nice of you. Wow, that's such a nice thought.
Yeah, I'll have a look at the old....
-Yes, sir? -You want to keep that skateboard?

translation.es: No la pongas en el suelo.

translation.en: Eat it! Eat it! Eat it!
Eat your vegetables, Gordon. Come on!
No, I'm not gonna take a picture of it. Put him down, man.
translation.es: No voy a tomar una foto de eso.Bájalo, hombre.

translation.en: Get up! Come on! Come on! Get up!

translation.es: No voy a tomar la foto.

translation.en: ...we still on for after school today?
translation.es: ¿Nos vamos a verdespués de la escuela?
Espero que estés haciendo tus tareas.

translation.en: -Okay, move. -No, how about we go to class?
I thought that was great what you did.
translation.es: Me pareció maravilloso lo que hiciste.

translation.en: It was stupid, but it was great.
You should go to the nurse. You might have a concussion.
translation.es: Ve con la enfermera. Puedes tener una concusión.

translation.en: I want to know if you know your name.
translation.es: Quiero ver si tú lo sabes.

translation.en: I'd still go to the nurse though.
translation.es: Aun así, yo iría con la enfermera.

translation.en: I'm making spaghetti and meatballs tonight.
Since when don't you like spaghetti and meatballs, huh?
translation.es: ¿Desde cuándo no te gustael espagueti con albóndigas?

translation.en: I'm all right. Just-- I fell, skating.

translation.es: Ben Parker, que ni se te ocurra...

translation.en: ...think about leaving that filthy box in my kitchen.
translation.es: ...dejar esa caja cochina en mi cocina.

translation.en: Oh, well, then, by all means...

translation.es: Deja esa caja cochina en mi cocina.

translation.en: Why you kids ride those things, I'll never know.
translation.es: No entiendo por qué... ...andan en esas cosas.

translation.en: -Trust me, we were. -All right. Good to know.
-Where's the flood? -Follow me. I'll show you.
translation.es: ¿Dónde está la inundación? Sígueme y te enseño.

translation.en: Too much water for the condenser tray or the heat exchange tubing.
translation.es: Es mucha agua para esoo para el intercambiador de calor.

translation.en: This has got to be the fill line.
That's the only thing that makes any sense.
translation.es: Es lo único que tiene sentido.

translation.en: No, not tonight. I'll go by the hardware store tomorrow.
translation.es: Esta noche, no.Mañana iré a la ferretería.

translation.en: Good deal. And meanwhile, put this on your face.
translation.es: Bien. Mientras tanto,ponte esto en la cara.

translation.en: Come on. I know a right cross when I see one.
translation.es: Por favor, reconozcoun cruzado de derecha.

translation.en: Yes or no? Do I have to call somebody's father?
translation.es: ¿Sí o no,tengo que llamar a un padre?

translation.en: Well, I wouldn't tell your Aunt May.
translation.es: Yo no le diría a tu tía May.

translation.en: I pity the poor kid who'd have to suffer her wrath.
translation.es: Pobre del que tengaque aguantar su furia.

translation.en: Before you come up, see if...
They fix pipes and pump things.
I forgot all about that thing. It was your dad's.
translation.es: Había olvidado eso por completo. Era de tu papá.

translation.en: -Yeah. -He asked us to keep it safe.
He saw it in the window of that leather shop over on 9th Avenue.
translation.es: La vio en la vitrina deesa tienda en la 9a. Avenida.

translation.en: He was 19. What does a 19-year-old kid need with a briefcase?
translation.es: Tenía 19 años.¿Para qué quería un portafolio?

translation.en: And guess who sold it to him.
He asked you to keep this safe? There's nothing in here.
translation.es: ¿Te pidió... ...que lo guardaras?Aquí no hay nada.

translation.en: Have you looked? There's nothing here.
Your father was a very secretive man, Peter.
Who's that? Do you know who that is?
Some guy who worked with your dad, I guess.
translation.es: Un tipo que trabajaba... ...con tu papá, supongo.

translation.en: Just take this off the table, all right?
We're gonna eat. Off. And wash your hands.
translation.es: Vamos a comer. Quítalo.Y lávate las manos...

translation.en: I need you to be a good boy.
translation.es: Necesito que te portes bien, Peter.

translation.en: There's something your mom and I have to do.
translation.es: Tu mamá y yo... ...tenemos algo que hacer.

translation.en: Oh, my God. You look just like him.
translation.es: -Sí, ¿qué hay?-Dios mío. Eres idéntico a él.

translation.en: Hell, I stopped being able to help with your homework when you were 10.
translation.es: Dejé de ayudarte con tus tareascuando tenías diez años.

translation.en: What I'm trying to say is...
...I know it's been rough for you without your dad.
translation.es: ...que ha sido duro no tener a tu papá.

translation.en: And I know we don't talk much about them.
translation.es: Yo sé que no hablamos de ellos.

translation.en: -Yeah, it's all right. -No, it is not all right.
I wish I could change it, but I can't.
translation.es: Quisiera poder cambiar eso,pero no puedo.

translation.en: That's the name of the guy in the picture with your dad.
translation.es: Así se llama el señor de la foto.

translation.en: They worked together for years and they were close.
translation.es: Trabajaron juntos durante años.Eran muy amigos.

translation.en: But after that night, we never saw him again.
translation.es: Pero después de esa noche,no lo volvimos a ver.

translation.en: I don't know. I'm here to see Dr. Connors.
translation.es: No sé. Vengo a ver... -...al doctor Connors.-Entiendo.

translation.en: Right. You'll find yourself to the left.
You are here for the internship?
You'll find your badge to the left.
-Having trouble finding yourself? -No. Yeah, I got it.
Born from the mind of our founder, Norman Osborn...
...the Oscorp Tower houses 108 floors of innovation.
translation.es: ...la Torre Oscorp consisteen 108 pisos de innovación.

translation.en: Our scientific minds are pushing the boundaries of defense, biomedical...
translation.es: Nuestros científicos están ampliando lasfronteras de la tecnología de defensa...

translation.en: ...and chemical technologies. The future lies within.
translation.es: Nuestros científicos están ampliando lasfronteras de la tecnología de defensa... ...biomédica y química.El futuro yace dentro.

translation.en: I'm Gwen Stacy, a senior at Midtown Science...
translation.es: Yo soy Gwen Stacy. Estudio en Midtown.
Soy jefa de internos del señor Connors.

translation.en: I'll be with you for the duration of your visit.

translation.es: Esa es la regla.Si recuerdan eso...

translation.en: Look, listen. Tell them Rodrigo Guevara is here.
Just tell them Rodrigo Guevara is here!
I guess I don't need to tell you what happens if you forget.
translation.es: Supongo que no necesito decirlesqué pasa si lo olvidan.

translation.en: Welcome. My name is Dr. Curtis Connors.
translation.es: Bienvenidos. Yo soy el doctor Curtis Connors.

translation.en: Yes, in case you're wondering, I'm a southpaw.
translation.es: Y por si tienen curiosidad,soy zurdo.

translation.en: I'm not a cripple, I'm a scientist...
translation.es: No soy un lisiado. Soy la mayor autoridad en herpetología.

translation.en: ...and the world's foremost authority on herpetology.
translation.es: Soy la mayor autoridad en herpetología.

translation.en: That's reptiles, for those of you who don't know.
translation.es: En reptiles, para los que no lo saben.

translation.en: Like the Parkinson's patient who watches on in horror...
translation.es: Pero como la paciente de Parkinson... ...que ve cómo su cuerpo la traiciona...

translation.en: ...as her body slowly betrays her... ...or the man with macular degeneration...
...whose eyes grow dimmer each day, I long to fix myself.
translation.es: ...que siente cómo se nubla su vista,yo deseo arreglarme.

translation.en: I want to create a world without weakness.
translation.es: Quiero crear un mundo sin debilidad.

translation.en: Anyone care to venture a guess just how?
...when the brain cells that produce dopamine...
But a zebra fish has the ability...
If you could give this ability...
translation.es: Si le pudieran dar esa habilidad...

translation.en: ...to the woman you're talking about, that's that. She's....
translation.es: ...a la mujer con Parkinson, se acabó.

translation.en: Yeah, you just have to look past the gills on her neck.
translation.es: Sólo hay que ignorarlas agallas en el cuello.

translation.en: I'm afraid duty calls. I'll leave you in the more-than-capable hands of Miss Stacy.
translation.es: Me temo que el deber llama. Los dejocon la muy capaz señorita Stacy.

translation.en: If you'd like to gather round.
Welcome to Oscorp's tree of life.
translation.es: Bienvenidos al árbolde la vida de Oscorp.

translation.en: Our planet's tree of life is immense.
I was gonna say I work here...
translation.es: Iba a decir que trabajo aquí...

translation.en: ...but it seems like you do work here. So you know that I don't.
translation.es: ...pero tú trabajas aquí.Vas a saber que no es cierto.

translation.en: -You following me? -No, I'm not following you, no.
translation.es: ¿Me estás siguiendo? No, no te estoy siguiendo.¡No sabía que trabajabas aquí!

translation.en: -I had no idea you worked here. -Why would you be here?
translation.es: No, no te estoy siguiendo.¡No sabía que trabajabas aquí! ¿Y entonces?

translation.en: -I have to lead this tour group. -I know.
translation.es: -Tengo que dirigir este grupo.-Ya lo sé.

translation.en: I'll ask you more about this later. Do not get me in trouble.
translation.es: Seguimos con esto más tarde.No me metas en problemas.

translation.en: -I promise you I won't. -Stay with the group.
All right, guys? I'm gonna take you to the bioreactor room now.
translation.es: ¿Muchachos? Los voy a llevaral cuarto del biorreactor.

translation.en: We received the results from the mRNA sequences this morning.
translation.es: Recibimos los resultados de lassecuencias del ARNm esta mañana.

translation.en: We are close, but it's gonna take time.
translation.es: Nos falta poco,pero va a tomar tiempo.

translation.en: Norman Osborn is dying, Dr. Connors.
Or we'll both lose our heads.
All right, give me the badge.
Disgusting. Now I smell like beer.
translation.es: Qué asco. Ahora huelo a cerveza.

translation.en: I didn't mean to do that.
No, man, no. Not my board.
Next and final stop, Coney Island.
This beats all other meat loafs.
translation.es: Le gana a todoslos pasteles de carne.
A nadie le gusta tu pastel de carne.

translation.en: He took the frozen macaroni and cheese.
translation.es: Se llevó los macarronescon queso congelados.

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me you didn't like my meat loaf?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me dijisteque no te gustaba mi pastel de carne?

translation.en: You could have said that to me 37 years ago.
How many meat loafs have I made for you?
-You don't remember me. I-- -The intern from the other day.
translation.es: Usted no se acuerda de mí. Eres el interno del otro día.

translation.en: I'm sure you're very nice, but this is a home.
translation.es: Pareces buena persona,pero esta es mi casa.

translation.en: I ask you to make an appointment with my office.
translation.es: Te pido que hagasuna cita en mi oficina.
Soy el hijo de Richard Parker.

translation.en: I'm afraid I can't help you much.
translation.es: No te puedo ayudar mucho.No sé por qué se fueron...

translation.en: I don't know why they left or where they were going.
translation.es: No te puedo ayudar mucho.No sé por qué se fueron... ...ni a dónde iban.

translation.en: Your father and I were mocked for our theories.
translation.es: Pero se burlaronmucho de tu papá y de mí.

translation.en: Not just in the community at large, but at Oscorp, as well.
translation.es: No sólo en la comunidad científica,en Oscorp también.

translation.en: And then your father bred the spiders...
translation.es: Y luego tu padre crió las arañas...

translation.en: We were gonna change the lives of millions.
translation.es: Íbamos a cambiarlas vidas de millones...

translation.en: And I knew without him, I....
translation.es: Y yo sabía que sin él, yo...

translation.en: So I stayed away from you...
translation.es: Así que me alejé de ti...

translation.en: And for that, I'm truly sorry.
Say you got it to work.
Like, how much would the foreign species take over?
What could the side effects be?
It's hard to say, considering no subject survived.
translation.es: Es difícil saberlo.Ningún sujeto ha sobrevivido.

translation.en: How did you come up with this?
Peter, how about coming to see me at the Tower...
translation.es: ¿Podrías ir a verme a la Torre...

translation.en: Number one, Reggie. Run it, buddy.
You did that on purpose, Flash!
I should've. You better watch your back.
-Come on, man. -Why don't you take it from me?
translation.es: -¡Vamos, hombre!-¿Por qué no me la quitas?

translation.en: -Take it from him! -Come on, Flash. Take it.
All right, bring it! Come on, Parker! Come on!
-Peter's behavior is just unacceptable. -They won't make us pay...
translation.es: La conducta de Peter... ...es inaceptable. No nos van a hacer...

translation.en: -...for the backboard. -I don't care about the backboard.
translation.es: -...pagar el tablero.-No me importa el tablero.

translation.en: What I heard in there just now.
-Yeah. -Is he the kid that hit you?
So all this is about getting even.
If so, I guess you must feel pretty good about yourself now, right?
Well, thanks to this little escapade of yours...
...I had to change shifts at work...
...so you have to pick up Aunt May tonight at 9 o'clock. Understood?
translation.es: Tú tendrás que recogera la tía May a las nueve. ¿Entendido?
Es la chica de tu computadora.
Sí. Te tiene en su computadora.Está en libertad condicional.
Te tiene en su computadora.Está en libertad condicional.
No se te olvide tu tía May.

translation.en: He's a pathological liar. He thought you were someone else.
translation.es: Es un mentiroso patológico. Creía que eras otra.

translation.en: Oh, man, you don't have me on your computer?
I took a photo of the debate team, and you're in the debate team.
translation.es: Tomé una foto del equipo de debatey tú estás en el equipo.

translation.en: ...he must have seen-- I was touching up stuff.
I was.... I'm not gonna answer that.
I didn't get expelled. I got community service.
translation.es: No me expulsaron.Tengo que hacer servicio comunitario.

translation.en: So you want to-- I don't know...?
We could do something else, or we could--
translation.es: O podríamos hacer otra cosa,o podríamos...

translation.en: -If you don't feel like, we could-- -Yeah.
Okay. All right, good. Sounds good.
-I can't right now, I can't right now. -Yeah, no.
-I'm so busy right now. -I know, me too.
...that's X-ray video. That's the only one on the planet. We have....
translation.es: ...video de rayos X.El único en el planeta. Tenemos...
-...pruebas de línea humana...-Me acuerdo de eso.

translation.en: Yeah, I remember a picture of that in my dad's office.
translation.es: Había una foto de élen la oficina de mi papá.

translation.en: The idea was so simple. You load it with an antigen.
translation.es: La idea era simple,cargarlo con un antígeno.

translation.en: It creates a cloud which can be dispersed over a neighborhood, even a city.
translation.es: Crea una nube, que puedes arrojarsobre un barrio o una ciudad.

translation.en: Theoretically, you could cure polio in an afternoon.
translation.es: En teoría, puedes curarla polio en una tarde.

translation.en: Well, others disagreed. What if the device were loaded with a toxin?
translation.es: Otros lo rechazaron.¿Qué si le ponen una toxina?

translation.en: What if you wanted to opt out?
You can't run away from a cloud after all, so here it lies, gathering dust.
translation.es: ...huir de una nube.Así que aquí está, empolvándose.

translation.en: What you see here is a computer model of a lizard.
translation.es: Esto es un modelode una lagartija.

translation.en: Many of these wonderful creatures have so brilliantly adapted...
translation.es: Muchas de estas criaturas sehan adaptado tan brillantemente...

translation.en: ...that they can regenerate entire limbs at will.
We're trying to harness this capability...
...and transfer it into our host subject:

translation.es: Freddy, el ratón de tres patas.

translation.en: See what I'm trying to do?
-Come on, come on, come on. -Pending. Failed.
Meet Fred and Wilma, our three-legged mice.
translation.es: Te presento a Fred y a Wilma... ...nuestros ratones... ...de tres patas.

translation.en: Okay. Careful, don't want to stick you by mistake.
translation.es: Tranquilo. Cuidado. No te quiero picar por error.

translation.en: Human trials aren't until next week.
translation.es: Las pruebas humanasson en una semana.

translation.en: Now, don't answer that, but I'm glad to know it's working.
translation.es: No contestes.Me da gusto saber que funciona.

translation.en: You owe your aunt an apology bigtime.
translation.es: Le debes una disculpa a tu tía,una disculpa grande.

translation.en: Be a man. Get in there and apologize.
translation.es: Sé un hombre. Entra y pide disculpas.

translation.en: Honestly, you don't have to apologize to me. It's your--
Look, I'm sorry, I got distracted.
Your aunt, my wife, had to walk 12 blocks alone...
translation.es: Tu tía, mi esposa, tuvo que caminar12 calles, sola...

translation.en: ...in the middle of the night and then wait in a deserted subway station...
translation.es: ...de noche y esperar en una estacióndesierta del metro...

translation.en: ...I am completely capable of walking home--
translation.es: ...yo soy completamente capazde caminar a casa sola...

translation.en: You will not defend this boy!
You're a lot like your father.
translation.es: Te pareces mucho a tu padre.

translation.en: You really are, Peter, and that's a good thing...
translation.es: De verdad, lo cual es bueno.

translation.en: ...but your father lived by a philosophy, a principle, really.
translation.es: Pero tu papá tenía una filosofía,un principio.

translation.en: He believed that if you could do good things for other people...
translation.es: Él creía que si podías haceralgo bueno por los demás...

translation.en: ...you had a moral obligation to do those things.

translation.es: Eso es lo que está en juego aquí.

translation.en: That's all well and good. So where is he?
He didn't think it was his responsibility to be here to tell me himself?
translation.es: ¿No era su responsabilidadestar aquí para decirme eso?

translation.en: Oh, come on, how dare you?
How dare I? How dare you?
Ben, leave him alone for a little while. He'll be all right.
translation.es: Déjalo en paz un rato.Se va a calmar.

translation.en: Yeah, you're holding up the line. No.
You can leave a penny, you can't take a penny.
translation.es: No. Puedes dejar un centavo,no puedes agarrar uno.

translation.en: ...a penny anytime, you have to spend 10 dollars...
translation.es: ...un centavo cuando sea.Necesitas gastar diez dólares...

translation.en: ...to take a penny. It's store policy.
-You're holding up my line. -I don't have 2 cents.
translation.es: -¿Vas a pagar? Estás estorbando.-No tengo dos centavos.

translation.en: You can't afford milk, step aside.
translation.es: Si no tienes para la leche,quítate.

translation.en: Daddy didn't give you enough milk money today?
Someone call an ambulance! Uncle Ben, Uncle Ben.
Witnesses gave a description to the sketch artist. I need you to take a look.
translation.es: Los testigos se lo describierona un dibujante. Necesito que lo mire.

translation.en: I didn't expect you would, ma'am. Homicide detectives are on it.
translation.es: No esperaba que lo conociera, señora.Los detectives... ...están investigando.A ver qué descubren.

translation.en: We'll see what they turn up.
There's one other thing. He has a star...
translation.es: Hay una cosa más.Tiene una estrella...

translation.en: Peter, I know things have been difficult lately...
translation.es: Peter, yo sé que las cosashan estado difíciles últimamente...

translation.en: I think I know what you're feeling.
translation.es: Creo que sélo que estás sintiendo.

translation.en: -Not today. -Come on, I just want to talk.
translation.es: -Hoy no, Flash.-Por favor, sólo quiero hablar.

translation.en: You like beating on old men?
-You're in the wrong place. -When were you in Queens?
translation.es: -Estás donde no debías.-¿Cuándo estuviste en Queens?

translation.en: Get back here, man! Get him!
He has a star tattooed on his left hand.
translation.es: Tiene una estrella tatuadaen su mano izquierda.

translation.en: I know what you look like!

translation.es: ...el BioCable tiene una gran resistencia.Estamos empezando...

translation.en: We're just beginning to understand all the potential industrial applications.
translation.es: ...el BioCable tiene una gran resistencia.Estamos empezando... ...a entender todos sus usosindustriales.

translation.en: A single pellet can safely store several hundred meters...
translation.es: Una sola bolita puede contenercientos de metros...

translation.en: Attention, all units in the confines of Precinct 13, receiving a 10-30...
translation.es: Atención, todas las patrullascerca de la comisaría 13.
Hay un disturbioen West 19 y Broadway.
Asaltante es un varón blanco,30 años y pico...

translation.en: Last seen on foot heading eastbound on 19th Street.
translation.es: Fue visto yendo al estepor la calle 19.

translation.en: Well, no, he wears a mask.
...are suspects with serious rap sheets. They're calling him a vigilante.
translation.es: ...a sospechosos con antecedentescriminales. Lo llaman un vigilante.

translation.en: Okay, he's not a vigilante, he's an anarchist.
translation.es: No lo es, es un anarquista.

translation.en: Extraordinary velocity vector is a function...

translation.es: ...se debe a la masa y aceleración.

translation.en: Come on, you know better than anyone...
...the weight on any pendulum has no effect on speed.
translation.es: ...que el peso de un péndulono afecta su velocidad.

translation.en: It doesn't affect frequency, but it's totally a factor in momentum.
translation.es: La frecuencia, no, pero esun factor clave para su momento.

translation.en: In the future, if you're gonna steal cars...
translation.es: En el futuro, si vas a robar autos...

translation.en: ...don't dress like a car thief, man.
translation.es: ...no te vistas como ladrón de autos.

translation.en: What are you? You a cop?
Really? You seriously think I'm a cop? Cop in a skin-tight red-and-blue suit?
translation.es: ¿De verdad? ¿En serio crees que soypolicía? Un policía con un traje ceñido.

translation.en: I was going more for the guys who do the luge.

translation.es: Use la ventana.Salga por la ventana.

translation.en: There you go. You got it.
-Just let me go. -Is that a real knife?

translation.es: -¿Una navaja de verdad?-Sí, es de verdad.

translation.en: -My weakness, it's small knives. -Just let me go.
translation.es: Mi debilidad.¡Pequeñas navajas! -Déjame ir y ya.-¡Todo, menos...

translation.en: Anything but knives! Oh, it's so simple.

translation.es: Telarañas. Un invento mío.No creo que te interese.

translation.en: -I don't think you want to know. -Let me go!
translation.es: Telarañas. Un invento mío.No creo que te interese. ¡Suéltame!

translation.en: Okay, one second. Hold on, one second.
Come on, let me go. Stop it!
This could've gone a lot worse.
No one grasps the concept of the mask.
translation.es: Nadie capta el conceptode la máscara.

translation.en: I just did 80 percent of your job.
translation.es: Hice el 80 por ciento de su trabajo.

translation.en: And that? That's how you repay me?
You don't have to wait up for me.
No, you most certainly will not.
Take off the damn hood and look at me.
Please go to sleep, Aunt May.
I can't sleep. Don't you understand? I can't sleep.

translation.es: La genética entre dos especiesestá funcionando.

translation.en: I've used the lizard DNA to help Freddy regrow that limb.
translation.es: Usé ADN de lagartopara regenerar la pata de Freddy.

translation.en: No, it's hard work and promise.
-It's a step closer to the primate lab. -He doesn't have time for every little step.
translation.es: -Nos acerca al laboratorio de primates.-No hay tiempo para cada pasito.

translation.en: Unless he wants to be a lab rat.
translation.es: O será una rata de laboratorio.

translation.en: You have to start human trials.
translation.es: Tiene que empezar las pruebascon humanos.

translation.en: -Now. -No, I don't, and no, I won't.
translation.es: Ahora mismo. No es obligatorio y no lo haré.

translation.en: -Well, then he's going to die. -People die.
Where are you going to find the people to volunteer?
As far as anyone's concerned, it's for a flu shot.
translation.es: Se les dice que son vacunascontra la gripe.

translation.en: I might think the Veterans Hospital is a place to start.
translation.es: Podemos empezaren el hospital de los veteranos.

translation.en: It's a little late for shock and indignation.
translation.es: Es un poco tardepara sorprenderse o indignarse.

translation.en: I have no idea what you're talking about.

translation.es: A Richard Parker le quedaba bien.

translation.en: On you, it's a cheap suit, as it was then.
translation.es: A usted le queda como un traje barato,ahora y antes.

translation.en: I had nothing to do with that.
translation.es: Yo no tuve nada que ver.

translation.en: Is that what you told his son?
translation.es: ¿Eso le dijo a su hijo Peter?

translation.en: I don't know what you're saying.
You don't know, or you don't wanna know?
Richard Parker said just about the same thing then that you are saying now.
translation.es: Richard Parker dijolo mismo que usted está diciendo.

translation.en: The clock is ticking, Dr. Connors.
The formula is ours now anyway.
translation.es: La fórmula ya es nuestrade todos modos,.

translation.en: Say goodbye to that arm you have dreamed of.
translation.es: Despídase del brazo de sus sueños.

translation.en: Have your office cleared out by the morning.
translation.es: Desaloje su oficinaantes de la mañana.

translation.en: Your toys can be taken away too, you know.

translation.es: -¿Es jueves?¿Qué te pasó en el ojo?

translation.en: Maybe I got a rash or....
It's bad. Have you gone to the nurse?
No, no. I know. I know.
...you can come to this address at 8:00 tonight.
translation.es: ...puedes ir a esta direcciónhoy a las 8 p.m.
Mi mamá va a preparar lubina.

translation.en: It's apartment 2016. I didn't write that part down.

translation.es: No sé por qué no lo anoté.

translation.en: How did you get out there?
-This is your room. -Yes, this is my room.
translation.es: -Este es tu cuarto.-Sí, este es mi cuarto.

translation.en: No, it's impressive. They actually held together very well.
You have your suit in there?
It's for dinner. Are you gonna--?
-You must be Peter. -Dad, this is Peter.
translation.es: Usted ha de ser Peter. Papá, te presento a Peter.
Espero que le guste la lubina.

translation.en: The car is taking him to the Veterans Hospital in Brooklyn.
translation.es: El chofer se lo llevóal hospital de veteranos.

translation.en: You have to stop him. He--
I would, but I always lose him on the bridge.
translation.es: Lo haría, pero se me vala conexión en el puente.

translation.en: I'll make sure Dr. Ratha returns your call as soon as possible.
translation.es: Le diré al doctor Rathaque lo llame enseguida.

translation.en: I'm going to Holton Avenue, across the river. I'm in a hurry.
translation.es: Voy a la Avenida Holton,al otro lado del río. Tengo prisa.

translation.en: You want me to take the tunnel or the bridge?
Hey, you all right back there?
The head goes on the other--
Help Gwen's friend with his fish.
translation.es: ...ayúdale al amigode Gwen con el pescado.

translation.en: -Tell us about your day. -Did you catch that spider guy yet?
translation.es: -Cuéntanos de tu día.-¿Ya agarraste a ese tipo araña?

translation.en: No, we didn't catch him yet.
But we will. He's an amateur...
...who's assaulting civilians in the dead of night.
translation.es: ...que ataca civiles a mitad de la noche.

translation.en: I mean, I saw that video...
...with him and the car thief, and....
I think most people would say that he was...

translation.es: La mayoría de la gentese equivocaría.

translation.en: If I wanted the car thief off the street, he'd already be off the street.
translation.es: Si yo quisiera, ese ladrónhubiera estado fuera de la calle.

translation.en: The car thief was leading us to the people who run the operation.
translation.es: El ladrón nos estaba llevandocon los cabezas... ...de los robos.Era un golpe de seis meses.
...de los robos.Era un golpe de seis meses.

translation.en: It's called strategy. I'm sure you're aware of the term?
You've heard about that in school?
translation.es: -¿La ha oído mencionar en la escuela?-Sí.
-¿La ha oído mencionar en la escuela?-Sí. Bien.

translation.en: -He didn't know you had a plan. -You seem to know...
translation.es: -Él no sabía que usted tenía un plan.-Sabe mucho...

translation.en: ...a lot about this. Know something we don't?
translation.es: ...de ese caso.¿Sabe algo que yo no sepa?

translation.en: -Whose side are you on? -I'm not on anyone's side.
translation.es: -¿De qué lado está?-Del lado de nadie.

translation.en: -I saw a video on the Internet-- -You saw the video on the Internet.
translation.es: Vi un video en internet... Vio el video en internet. Caso cerrado.

translation.en: -Well, then the case is closed. -Well, no.
If you watch the video-- Maybe send you a link?
translation.es: Si ve el video... Le mandaré un enlace.

translation.en: It looks like he's trying to help.
On the Internet he's being made out to look like a hero.
translation.es: En internet pareceun héroe enmascarado o algo.

translation.en: No, no. I'm not saying he's a hero.
translation.es: No, no. No digo que sea un héroe.

translation.en: -What are you trying to say? -He's trying to help.
He's trying to do something the police can't.
translation.es: Quiere hacer algoque la policía no puede.

translation.en: -I don't know. -What do you think we do?
-...with our thumbs planted up our asses? -George.
translation.es: ...con los pulgares metidos en el trasero?

translation.en: He stands for what you stand for.
translation.es: Creo que él comparte sus ideales:

translation.en: Protecting innocent people from bad guys.
I stand for law and order. That's what I stand for.
This guy wears a mask like an outlaw.
translation.es: El tipo usa una máscara,como un forajido.

translation.en: He's hunting down criminals that all look the same...
translation.es: Está cazando unos criminalescon cierto aspecto...

translation.en: ...like he's got some sort of personal vendetta.
But he's not protecting innocent people, Mr. Parker.
translation.es: Pero no está protegiendoa inocentes, señor Parker.
Vamos a tomar el aire, Peter.

translation.en: -Dad, we need to talk. -Yes, we do.
I'm sorry if I insulted you. It was not my intention.
-You're welcome. -Branzino was real good, Mrs. Stacy.
I'm sorry. I thought he was going to arrest me at one point.
translation.es: Perdón.Creí que me iba a arrestar.

translation.en: No, I wouldn't have let him arrest you.
-What happened to your face? -I wanna tell you something.
translation.es: -¿Qué te pasó en la cara?-Te voy a decir algo.

translation.en: Okay, okay, okay. I gotta tell you this one thing.
translation.es: Te tengo que decir una cosa.

translation.en: I gotta tell you this one thing about the vigilante and the car thief.
translation.es: Y es sobre... ...el vigilante y el ladrón de autos, ¿sí?
...el vigilante y el ladrón de autos, ¿sí? ¿Qué?

translation.en: -No, no, no. -I don't want to talk about that.
translation.es: -No, no.-Yo no quiero hablar de eso.

translation.en: Forget that. I won't talk about that.
translation.es: Olvídalo, no voy a hablar de eso.

translation.en: -I'm gonna talk about me, okay? -What about you?
It's impo-- I wish I could just--
I can't. It's hard to say.
Your father wants you to come inside.
Will you please find out what is going on, Alfred?
Somebody help! Help me! My kid is trapped!
Just a normal guy, all right?

translation.es: De acuerdo. Te voy a sacar.

translation.en: Okay, look. I'll undo the belt.
You hold on to that seat in front of you. On three?
translation.es: Voy a desabrochar el cinturón.Agárrate... ...del asiento de enfrente.¿A la de tres?

translation.en: See how easy that was? You did a great job.
There you go. That's it. That's it, buddy.
Do me a favor. A little faster, okay, bud?
You're doing great, buddy. You're doing great.
...9 p.m. last night, an incident took place on the Williamsburg Bridge.
translation.es: ...hubo un incidenteen el Puente de Williamsburg.

translation.en: Much of what occurred is speculation at this point.
translation.es: Hay mucha especulaciónsobre lo que sucedió. Pero varios testigos...

translation.en: However, several eyewitnesses to the crime...
...as well as our own preliminary findings...
...have positively placed one individual at the scene.
translation.es: ...colocaron con certeza... ...a un hombre en la escena.

translation.en: ...for the masked vigilante known as Spider-Man.
And lastly, city council members met with homeowners and airport officials...
translation.es: Los concejales se reunieron conpropietarios y gente del aeropuerto...
¿Quién más sabe de esto? Sólo tú.

translation.en: You don't believe what the police are saying, do you?
translation.es: Tú no crees lo quedice la policía, ¿verdad?

translation.en: What did that thing on the bridge look like?
translation.es: ¿Cómo era la cosa esaen el puente?

translation.en: It was real big. Too big to be human.
Whatever was attacking them would have killed them.
translation.es: Esa cosa que los atacólos hubiera matado.

translation.en: So I gotta go after it.
It was good for me too.
I gave everyone the week off.
translation.es: Les di a todos la semana libre.

translation.en: No, I got a free track.
I wanted to ask you a question.
How would a predator track a reptile?
Most reptiles are at the top of their respective food chain.
translation.es: No sucede.Muchos reptiles dominan... ...sus cadenas alimenticias.

translation.en: Why the sudden interest in the cold-blooded?
translation.es: ¿Por qué te interesanlos de sangre fría?

translation.en: So because of the cold blood...
...would they react to changes in temperatures?
You'd have to catch one first.
Did you know there's a rumor of a new species in New York?
translation.es: ¿Sabes que hay el rumorde una especie nueva en Nueva York?

translation.en: What do you know about it? You seen it?
Never been better, Peter. Never been better.
translation.es: Me siento mejor que nunca, Peter.

translation.en: Afraid I have to ask you to leave.
translation.es: ...necesito pedirte que te vayas.Tengo un nuevo proyecto.

translation.en: I have a new project I'm working on. I need to be alone.
translation.es: ...necesito pedirte que te vayas.Tengo un nuevo proyecto. Necesito estar solo.

translation.en: Don't worry, Mr. Parker. I'll be back.
Mr. Mayor, if there was a giant dinosaur running around...
translation.es: Señor Alcalde, si hubiera un dinosaurio... ...le avisaría a usted primero.

translation.en: ...you would be the first to know.
So tell your son he can rest easy, all right?
translation.es: Dígale a su hijo quepuede estar tranquilo, ¿sí?

translation.en: Yeah. You and me both, sir.
-Mr. Parker, why are you not in school? -Got a free track.
translation.es: Señor Parker, ¿no está... -...en la escuela?-Tengo unas horas libres.

translation.en: Fine, there may not be a dinosaur running around.
translation.es: Quizá no haya un dinosaurioen Manhattan...

translation.en: There is something more dangerous, and I know who.
translation.es: ...pero hay algo más peligrosoy sé quién es.
-Usted sabe quién es.-El doctor Curtis Connors.

translation.en: ...who's my daughter's mentor. Is that who?
translation.es: ...que es el mentor de mi hija.¿Está hablando de él?

translation.en: Recently, Dr. Connors gave Gwen a glowing college recommendation.
translation.es: El doctor Connors recomendóa Gwen para la universidad.

translation.en: It was beautiful. When I read it, I cried.

translation.es: ¿Pero usted quiere queyo crea que él...

translation.en: ...that he is running around dressed up like a dinosaur?
translation.es: ¿Pero usted quiere queyo crea que él... ...anda disfrazado de dinosaurio?

translation.en: Not dressing up and not a dinosaur. He has transformed himself into a lizard.
translation.es: No disfrazado y no de dinosaurio.Se transformó en un lagarto.

translation.en: Let me ask you a question.
Do I look like the mayor of Tokyo to you?
I'm telling you the absolute truth.
This man has worked for his whole life on cross-species genetics.
translation.es: Este hombre se ha dedicadoa la genética interespecífica.

translation.en: He lost an arm, he tried to grow it back, but the equation was imbalanced.
translation.es: Perdió un brazo y lo quiere regenerar.Pero la ecuación está desequilibrada.

translation.en: He has turned into a lizard. He's using lizard DNA.
translation.es: Y es un lagarto. Usa ese ADN.

translation.en: He is dangerous, and he is planning something horrific. I know. I know.
translation.es: Es peligroso y está planeandoalgo espantoso. Lo sé.

translation.en: Okay. All right, I get it.

translation.es: Esto es lo que vamos a hacer:

translation.en: You'll go back to hanging out with the citizens of Tokyo.
translation.es: Usted regresará a convivircon los ciudadanos de Tokio...

translation.en: I'm gonna go back to protecting the citizens of this fine, fair city of ours.
translation.es: ...y yo volveré a proteger a la gente... ...de esta gran ciudad.

translation.en: Sergeant Butler, please escort Mr. Parker back to school.
translation.es: Sargento Butler,escolte al señor Parker... -...a su escuela.-Capitán Stacy, no estoy bromeando.

translation.en: Captain Stacy, I'm not messing around.
translation.es: -...a su escuela.-Capitán Stacy, no estoy bromeando.

translation.en: Just bring him in. Just call him in. You have to call him in.
He is a danger to everybody.
Get me everything we have on Dr. Curtis Connors.
translation.es: ...tráeme todo lo que tengamossobre el doctor Curtis Connors.

translation.en: Blood panels reveal lymphocyte and monocyte readings...
Subject no longer requires corrective lenses.
translation.es: El sujeto ya no requierelentes correctivos.

translation.en: This is no longer about curing ills.
translation.es: Ya no se tratade curar enfermedades.

translation.en: In attempt to redress regenerative relapse...
Also, my father is under the impression...
You should see the other guy.
The other guy, in this instance, being a giant mutant lizard.
translation.es: El otro, en este caso,era un enorme lagarto mutante.

translation.en: Do you want cocoa? Howard's making some.
translation.es: ...¿quieres chocolate caliente? Howard lo está preparando.

translation.en: No, Dad, I do not want cocoa.
I remembered somebody saying her fantasy was to live in a chocolate house.
translation.es: Alguien dijo la semana pasada quequería vivir en una casa de chocolate.

translation.en: I can't have cocoa right now because I'm work--
translation.es: Es que no puedo tomar chocolateahora porque estoy traba...

translation.en: I feel kind of pukey and just sort of....
-Like, emotional. I keep crying. -It's okay. Good.

translation.es: No paro de llorar. Es brutal.
Yo sé lo que es esto.

translation.en: Every day, for as long as I can remember...
translation.es: Todos los días, desde que tengomemoria...
Todos los días, desde que tengomemoria... ...mi papá se va en la mañana...

translation.en: ...and he's put a badge on his chest...
translation.es: ...y se pone una placa en el pecho...

translation.en: ...and strapped a gun to his hip.
And every day, for as long as I can remember...
translation.es: Y todos los días,desde que tengo memoria...

translation.en: ...I haven't known if he was gonna make it home.
translation.es: ...no sé si va a regresar a casa.

translation.en: I have to, because I created him.
translation.es: Tengo que, porque yo lo creé.

translation.en: Something my father had been working on, you know.
translation.es: Algo que mi papáhabía estado desarrollando.

translation.en: Secretly. Now I realize why he kept it a secret.
translation.es: En secreto.Ahora sé por qué era un secreto.

translation.en: Point is, this is my responsibility.
Let's just get out of here.
Just for a minute. Can we?
If my parents see me leaving, I'm dead.
translation.es: Si mis papás me ven salir,me matan.

translation.en: Your parents aren't gonna see you leaving.
translation.es: Tus papás no te van a ver salir.

translation.en: I'm not the one who needs help.
There will be no more loneliness...

translation.es: Una distribución a toda la especienos mejoraría...

translation.en: ...could enhance humanity on an evolutionary scale.
translation.es: Una distribución a toda la especienos mejoraría... ...a escala evolutiva.

translation.en: One has to adapt to survive.
"That, changing like the snake, I might be free...
...to cast off flesh wherein I dwell confined."
Would you give it all up...
translation.es: ¿Renunciarías a todo,después de lo que sabes...

translation.en: ...after all you know you can do?
translation.es: ¿Renunciarías a todo,después de lo que sabes... ...que puedes hacer?

translation.en: You're not gonna get in the way of my plan, Peter Parker!
I can save them. I can cure them.
There's no need to stop me, Peter.
-I'm gonna throw you out the window. -What?
translation.es: -Te voy a echar por la ventana.-¿Qué?
Habla el teniente Williamsde la policía de Nueva York.

translation.en: ...from the New York City Police Department.
translation.es: Habla el teniente Williamsde la policía de Nueva York. Hemos rodeado este edificio.

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm okay. I'm in the sewer, tracking him. I gotta stop him before anyone gets hurt.
translation.es: En el desagüe. Lo estoy rastreando.Necesito impedir que lastime a alguien.

translation.en: -Do you know how to run a serum? -I do it all the time.
translation.es: -¿Sabes preparar un suero?-Sí, hago sueros para Connors.

translation.en: Okay, great. Okay, I need you to go to Oscorp.
I need you to access the cross-species file. It's a blue serum.
translation.es: Revisa el archivo interespecífico.Es un suero azul.

translation.en: I spent my life as a scientist trying to create a world without weakness...
translation.es: He pasado mi vida de científicocreando un mundo sin debilidades...

translation.en: I sought to create a stronger human being...
translation.es: Traté de crear un ser humanomás fuerte...

translation.en: Human beings are weak, pathetic, feeble-minded creatures.
translation.es: Los seres humanos son criaturasdébiles, patéticas... ...imbéciles.

translation.en: ...when we can be so much more?
This is my gift to you.
translation.es: Este es el regalo que les doy.

translation.en: We have a confirmed sighting, sir. The Lizard's headed toward Canal Street.
translation.es: ¡Ya lo vieron! ¡El Lagarto va... -...a la estación de la Calle Canal!-¿Y el Hombre Araña?
-...a la estación de la Calle Canal!-¿Y el Hombre Araña? ¡Estaba en el colegio!

translation.en: I want that Spider-Man off the street.
The lizard creature has released a biological agent.
All efforts to stop him have failed...
...and he is now proceeding north on 7th Avenue. Over.
translation.es: Ahora se dirige al nortepor la 7a. Avenida. Cambio.

translation.en: You have to get out of there now.
Connors is on the way. He's coming to you right now.
translation.es: Connors va para allá.Va para allá ahora mismo.

translation.en: He needs the device. He's gonna infect the whole city!
translation.es: Necesita el aparatopara infectar a todos.

translation.en: You're gonna wait eight minutes after what I told you?
translation.es: ¿Vas a esperar ocho minutos?¡Va a haber muertos!

translation.en: Gwen! Gwen! You Mother Hubbard. Are you serious?
Stand down now, or we will open fire.
You are surrounded. There is no escape.
And your daughter's there right now.
Well, Paul, if I didn't see it, I wouldn't believe it.
translation.es: De no haberlo visto,no lo habría creído.

translation.en: I won't venture to say what it is crawling up...
translation.es: No me arriesgaré a decir qué es...

translation.en: ...the north side of the Oscorp Tower...
translation.es: ...lo que está trepando en la torre...

translation.en: ...but clearly it is not human and it is very, very strong.
translation.es: ...pero no es humanoy es muy, muy fuerte.

translation.en: We're getting the latest details. This is just coming in.
translation.es: Estamos recibiendo los últimosdetalles. Esto es nuevo.
...de todos al sur de la calle 54.

translation.en: If you are south of 54th Street...
translation.es: Si usted está al sur de la 54...

translation.en: ...you have to move out of the area immediately.
Spider-Man appears to be heading towards Oscorp.
translation.es: Parece que el Hombre Arañase dirige a Oscorp.

translation.en: ...and it's really not clear if he's gonna make it.
translation.es: ...y no está claro si va a llegar o no.
...salvó a mi hijo en el puente.

translation.en: Something bad's going down in Midtown.
Still friends with Matthews, that crane operator on 6th?
translation.es: ¿Eres amigo de Matthews, eloperador de grúa de la 6a. Avenida?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Get him on the phone for me.
Get him on the phone for me.
Hey, Charlie, get me Enriquez on 54th Street!
translation.es: Oye, Charlie, comunícamecon Enríquez en la 54.

translation.en: -You got it. -Angelo, get your mug over here.
...swing your jib arms over the avenue. Boom angles at 90 degrees.
translation.es: ...muevan sus brazos sobre la avenida.Manténganlas perpendiculares.

translation.en: Spider-Man needs those big boys high and lined up.
translation.es: El Hombre Arañalos necesita altos y alineados.

translation.en: Let's give him a clear approach. Over.
-I have to get this to Spider-Man. -Get in.
-It can stop the Lizard. -Get in the car.
translation.es: -¡Puede parar al Lagarto!-¡Súbete en el auto! ¡Vámonos!

translation.en: Your boyfriend is a man of many masks.
translation.es: Tu novio es un hombrede muchas máscaras.
Detonación en T menos dos minutos.

translation.en: -Okay. -Let's get you out of here. Come on.
translation.es: Bien. Hay que sacarlo de aquí.Vámonos.

translation.en: Look at me. Stay with me.
-Help's on the way, okay? -You need to....
You need to be gone when they get here.
I was wrong about you, Peter.
Sometimes the people closest to you.
translation.es: A veces la más cercana a ti.

translation.en: So I want you to promise me something, okay?
translation.es: Así que quieroque me prometas algo.
Deja a Gwen fuera de esto.

translation.en: An eerie calm has set in over New York City.
translation.es: Hay una calma extraña... ...en la ciudad de Nueva York.

translation.en: Apparently, some sort of aerosolized antidote...

translation.es: ...lanzaron un antídoto... ...de la Torre Oscorp, que parecehaber neutralizado las biotoxinas.

translation.en: ...which seems to have counteracted the biotoxins.
translation.es: ...de la Torre Oscorp, que parecehaber neutralizado las biotoxinas.

translation.en: Residents of Lower Manhattan can rest peacefully...
translation.es: La gente de Nueva Yorkpuede dormir tranquila...

translation.en: ...knowing that the alleged mastermind of this terror plot...
translation.es: ...sabiendo que el cerebro... ...de este complot terrorista,el doctor Curtis Connors, está preso.
...de este complot terrorista,el doctor Curtis Connors, está preso.

translation.en: ...on the street for a report in Lower Manhattan.
translation.es: ...está en la callereportando desde Lower Manhattan.

translation.en: Two of my teachers showed up.
Can't do this. Can't do this.
translation.es: No puedo hacer esto. No puedo.

translation.en: He made you promise, didn't he?
To stay away from me, so I'd be safe.
translation.es: ¿No acercarte a mípara que estuviera a salvo?

translation.en: I'm just no good for her.
Peter Parker, if there's one thing you are, it's good.
translation.es: Peter Parker,si algo eres, es bueno.

translation.en: Anyone has a problem with that can talk to me.
translation.es: Si no lo creen... ...que hablen conmigo.

translation.en: Peter, I know things have been difficult lately...
translation.es: Peter, yo sé que las cosashan estado... ...difíciles últimamente...

translation.en: I think I know what you're feeling.
translation.es: Creo que sélo que estás sintiendo.

translation.en: Ever since you were a little boy...
...you've been living with so many unresolved things.
Well, take it from an old man:
translation.es: Hazle caso a un hombre viejo:

translation.en: Those things send us down a road.
translation.es: Esas cosas nos envíanpor cierto camino.

translation.en: They make us who we are.
And if anyone's destined for greatness, it's you, son.
translation.es: Y si alguien está destinadoa la grandeza, eres tú, hijo.

translation.en: You owe the world your gifts.
translation.es: Le debes al mundo tus dones.

translation.en: You just have to figure out how to use them.
And know that wherever they take you...
translation.es: Y necesitas saber quea dondequiera que te lleven...
Así que regresa a casa, Peter.

translation.en: Come on, guys, you heard the bell. Get to class.
translation.es: Oyeron la campana,vuelvan a sus clases.

translation.en: I had a professor once who liked to tell his students...
translation.es: Yo tuve un profesoral que le gustaba decirnos que...

translation.en: ...that there were only 10 different plots in all of fiction.
Well, I'm here to tell you he was wrong.
translation.es: Yo les digo que no es cierto.

translation.en: At least we can always count on you.
Sorry, Miss Ritter, won't happen again, I promise.
translation.es: Perdón, no volverá a pasar,se lo prometo.

translation.en: Don't make promises you can't keep.
translation.es: No haga promesasque no puede cumplir.

translation.en: Yeah, but those are the best kind.
translation.es: Sí, pero esas son las mejores.

translation.en: Did you tell the boy the truth about his father?
translation.es: ¿Le dijiste la verdadacerca de su padre?

translation.en: So we'll let him be for now.
